On Wednesday 18 February 2004 08:00, Ramanand Hegde wrote:
> Does junit ini=
tialize all member variables to null between tests?
> If so, how can I avoi=
d it? I tried to implement blank setUp() and
> tearDown() methods, but that=
 did not work.

JUnit creates a new instance of your test class for each ru=
n.
Your tests should be independent of each other.
Place shared (duplicated=
) setup stuff in setUp.
See also 
	http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq=
.htm#tests_2

Robert
